animation_speed=”700″ uncode_shortcode_id=”128544″]health & wellbeing[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”h6″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_height=”fontheight-199788″ text_space=”fontspace-154403″ sub_lead=”yes” subheading=”More than just a place to live, we offer a home specifically designed for the comfort and entertainment of individuals and couples located in the heart of Lincoln.”]Staying healthy at Monson Care Home[/vc_custom_heading][vc_button size=”btn-lg” outline=”yes” border_width=”0″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fmonsoncarehome%2F|target:_blank” icon=”fa fa-facebook” uncode_shortcode_id=”145680″]Facebook[/vc_button][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ css_animation=”alpha-anim”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section overlay_alpha=”50″][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”food-nutrition”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_height=”fontheight-golden-h2″]food & nutrition[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]At Monson, we place great emphasis on providing our residents with fresh and nutritious food.

The home sources quality ingredients which are lovingly prepared by our in-house team of chefs each day.

There is a varied and ever-changing menu, from salads and something light in spring/summer to hearty, comforting meals in winter. We strive to accommodate any special dietary requirements, or any particular likes or dislikes.

Drinks, tea and snacks (including delicious, home-baked cakes) are served throughout the day and are available on request.

Meals are served in our bistro, where full table service is provided; for those who want to dine in the peace & quiet of their own room, room service is always available.

Relatives are always welcome to dine with their loved ones; just let us know you’re coming and our staff team will be happy to accommodate you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”9499″ media_width_percent=”100″ alignment=”right” shadow=”yes” shadow_weight=”sm” advanced=”yes” media_overlay_color=”color-glenda-grad-bottom” media_overlay_opacity=”100″ media_overlay_visible=”yes” media_text_visible=”yes” media_overlay_anim=”no” media_text_anim=”no” media_image_anim=”no” media_h_align=”center” media_v_position=”bottom” media_padding=”2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section back_color=”color-lxmt” overlay_alpha=”50″][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”3″ bottom_padding=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”facilities”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”9497″ media_width_percent=”100″ shadow=”yes” shadow_weight=”sm”][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_height=”fontheight-golden-h2″]amazing facilities[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes”]Purpose-built home with a range of facilities to suit your every need. Each bedroom at Monson is spacious, fully equipped and has been tastefully decorated.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”h6″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_space=”fontspace-154403″]Events and Activities in our home and in Lincoln[/vc_custom_heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][uncode_list]

  • All bedrooms have en-suite wet floor bathrooms, flat-screen TVs and high-speed internet so you can stay connected with loved ones. If you prefer something more relaxing, we have a specialist bath with a powered seat transfer
  • Socialise with friends in our very own pub, complete with reclaimed bar and fittings, pool room, cinema, hairdressing salon, covered courtyard and a large walled garden with raised flower beds

[/uncode_list][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][uncode_list]

  • Our air-conditioned lounges have smart TVs and views out to the walled garden and for those who want some quiet time, we have a library where you can sit back and read a book
  • Your privacy is important to us, that’s why we have a dedicated clinical room that facilitates our attending doctor, district nurses, chiropodist, dentist and optician.

[/uncode_list][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”activities”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_height=”fontheight-golden-h2″]stimulating activities[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]Centre of Lincoln – Entertainment and activities on our doorstep

We have a full schedule of activities taking place in the home, but for those who want to venture outdoors, our location offers more advantages than you would expect. With easy access to Lincoln town centre, there is a wealth of arts, culture and places to eat & drink on your doorstep. There is car parking behind the home in a large NCP car park, with good public transport links to benefit our residents, families and staff.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”9495″ media_width_percent=”100″ alignment=”right” shadow=”yes” shadow_weight=”sm”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
